original_title: Trivium - The Deepest Cuts Live Stream Vol. 2
overview: On Saturday October 24th, Trivium, The Kings of Streaming, are coming back with "The Deepest Cuts lI" a FREE livestream series from their rehearsal room via Matt Heafy's Twitch channel at 12pm LA * 3pm NY * 8pm UK * 9pm EU. They are taking you back into their jam room to give you more deep cuts that they rarely play and a few they have never played before. If you ever wanted to be a fly on the wall for their practices, this is your chance.
title: Trivium - The Deepest Cuts Live Stream Vol. 2
